  • Why specifically do we need the assumption of a joint probability distribution over the training data:
    Note that the assumption of a joint probability distribution allows us to model uncertainty in predictions (e.g. from noise in data) because is not a deterministic function of , but rather a random variable with conditional distribution for a fixed .
